segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, and she looks so peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is overflowing, but she doesn’t seem bothered at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being sneaky, but I can’t help but smile at their teamwork.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing the stool, and the girl is waiting so patiently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it’s funny how the woman is completely unaware of everything around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making a mess, but she’s just standing there, drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to get in trouble if she catches him, but for now, he’s getting away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so excited, and I hope she gets a cookie too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the woman will ever notice the water or the kids.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is so chaotic, but in a way, it’s kind of charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the boy doesn’t fall, but I’m enjoying the moment while it lasts.
segments.speaker: PAR
